channel.title: Hello, I'm Pranav from SupportBee.com
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I'm Pranav.
I have been working with SaaS businesses for a couple of years now, first as a developer and lately as a product designer/manager - being closely involved with product and business strategy/planning.
I've recently started a solo side-project, which I'd soon like to share it with the bootstrapped community. I'm working on getting a landing page ready to show some product mockups, and get some early validation.
I hope to be an active member of the community.
Cheers!

item.title: Hello, I'm Pranav from SupportBee.com
item.dc:creator: pranav7
item.description:
Thank you!

Indeed it is I think I have seen some of your commits around the source code.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, I'm Pranav from SupportBee.com
item.dc:creator: pjc
item.description:
It’s a small world. I know the SupportBee team from when they (and me) were in Startup Chile 5 or so years ago.

Welcome to the forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, I'm Pranav from SupportBee.com
item.dc:creator: pranav7
item.description:
Hello everyone, I’m Pranav.

I have been working with SaaS businesses for a couple of years now, first as a developer and lately as a product designer/manager - being closely involved with product and business strategy/planning.

I’ve recently started a solo side-project, which I’d soon like to share it with the bootstrapped community. I’m working on getting a landing page ready to show some product mockups, and get some early validation.

I hope to be an active member of the community.

Cheers!
